rreversegeocoder 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Download cities with population

    download_cities_with_population.Rd

    Given the number of population, get all the related information from geonames

    download_cities_with_population(n)

    Arguments

    n

    Population files available in geonames dump directory

    Details

    It returns a tibble with all the data

    See also

    <https://github.com/jrosell/rreversegeocoder/blob/main/R/cities.R>

    Examples

    download_cities_with_population(5000)
#> # A tibble: 53,234 × 19
#>    geonameid name  ascii…¹ alter…² latit…³ longi…⁴ featu…⁵ feature country cc2  
#>    <chr>     <chr> <chr>   <chr>     <dbl>   <dbl> <chr>   <chr>   <chr>   <chr>
